answerText: angular momentum[10] The Clebsch-Gordan series interrelates this man's namesake matrices. This author of The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Mathematics in the Natural Sciences co-names a theorem that allows one to use one element of the matrix of an irreducible tensor operator between angular momentum states to find the other elements.

question: Question: The eigenstates of the total form of this quantity are related to product states representing individual cases of this quantity using Clebsch-Gordan coefficients. For 10 points each: [10] Name this quantity that classically is equal to moment of inertia times angular velocity
